=XLIST example=

To use the XLIST command you would do something like this:

{{{
...
 IMAPFolder imf;
 String[] atts;
 Folder[] f = store.getDefaultFolder().xlist("*");
 for (Folder fd : f) {
      System.out.println(fd.getFullName());
      imf = (IMAPFolder) fd;
      atts = imf.getAttributes();
      for(String a: atts){
         System.out.println(a);
      }
      System.out.println();
 }
...
}}}
